newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Reliance RCG IT forges jv in Philippines.
newsitem.headline: Reliance RCG IT forges jv in Philippines.

text.p: U.S.-based RCG Information Technology Inc, a subsidiary of Reliance Group Holdings, said on Friday it had signed a partnership agreement with Open Systems Philippines Corp (OSPC) to open its first overseas operation in Manila.

"RCG IT and OSPC will provide a full spectrum of mainframe and client/server technologies and will be responsible for expanding RCG IT's local and Asian consulting business," RCG IT vice president Manny Rodriguez said in a statement.
RCG is one of the leading IT consulting companies in the United States. OSPC provides consulting and programming services to major Aisan companies.
